name: Dungeons and Demons
summary: Dungeons and Demons is an 8-map limit-removing episode for Doom II from various members of Doomer Boards. In the words of adventuresmith @xvertigox, this month's project lead, Dungeons and Demons "is an one shot DND campaign played one slow Sunday afternoon on a dingy UAC base. Can you find the Daikantana Staff and make it out with your life? Will you try to take on the BBEG too early and end up having to re-roll your character? Grab your die and lets find out."
